export var shuffle=function shuffle(array){var currentIndex=array.length,randomIndex;// While there remain elements to shuffle...
while(currentIndex!==0){// Pick a remaining element...
randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*currentIndex);currentIndex--;// And swap it with the current element.
var _ref=[array[randomIndex],array[currentIndex]];array[currentIndex]=_ref[0];array[randomIndex]=_ref[1];}return array;};
